sense.def:
Kadar je človek
behind a thing or person
, gleda tisti stvari ali osebi v hrbet.

seg.quote: There were two boys sitting behind me.
Joe was limping along behind his wife.
He followed a few paces behind.

sense.def:
To stay behind
pomeni, da na nekem kraju ostanemo še potem, ko so drugi že odšli.

To leave something behind
pomeni nečesa ne vzeti s seboj, ko odidemo.

Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
behind
, zamuja ali napreduje počasneje, kot drugi mislijo, da bi moral.

seg.quote: I got more and more behind.
The bus was badly behind schedule.

sense.def:
Izkušnja, ki je
behind someone
, je končana.

seg.quote: ...now that the war is behind us.
We must leave adolescence behind and grow up.

sense.def:
Razlog ali oseba
behind something
je tisto povzročila ali je za tisto odgovorna.

seg.quote: These were the reasons behind Macleod's statement.
...the man behind the modernizing of the station.

sense.def:
To be behind someone
pomeni nekoga podpirati.

seg.quote: The country was behind the President.

sense.def:
One's behind
je del telesa; na njem človek sedi.
